name: Pulse
headline: Production-Grade Unstructured Document Extraction
description: Pulse converts complex information into LLM-ready inputs. Our API supports all document formats, from PDFs to Word, Excel, etc. Pulse integrates seamlessly with any existing data pipeline in minutes without any training or complexity.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:data-engineering; industry:enterprise-software; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Sid Manchkanti, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder/CEO of Pulse (S24). Prev NVIDIA, D.E. Shaw, Berkeley CS

founders.name: Ritvik Pandey, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder/CTO of Pulse (S24). Prev Tesla ML, Goldman Sachs, Georgia Tech CS/Math

I’m technical
# Pulse understands your complex data
The world's best document processing engine.
Pulse understands your complex data 
Enterprise-scale pipeline for document extraction.
[Vision Model](https://www.runpulse.com/<#vision-model>)[Quick and Secure Integration](https://www.runpulse.com/<#agentic-spreadsheets>)[Custom Processing](https://www.runpulse.com/<#semantic-search>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670592d088e2d8bd68b0f6ec/670cd1647b2d0225cc758d82_Hero%20circle%20light.png)
## Document vision model
Accurately parse any document and create LLM-ready text.
Unstructured Layouts
Pulse can read documents just like a human. No matter the format—charts, graphs, tables, text, etc.—we extract it with unparalleled accuracy.
Vertical-Agnostic
Our zero-shot model works across all industries – finance, healthcare, legal, supply chain, etc. We do not train on your proprietary data, simply integrate our API in under 5 minutes. 
Example: Three-Way Matching
Take the extra step after JSON extraction to verify your invoices, POs, and GRNs. Automatically flag match exceptions and generate follow-ups to suppliers. 
## Quick and Secure Integration
Integrate in 5 minutes, built with enterprise security and compliance measures.
Quick integration
Pulse is deployed via our hosted-API. Complete setup takes 5 minutes, and we have detailed documentation for a streamlined process.
Industry-leading security standards
We aim to meet the highest level of security certification across every industry. Pulse is SOC 2 Type 2 and HIPAA compliant. We are happy to sign a BAA for qualifying customers.
Zero-Data Retention
We maintain strict zero data retention agreements and ensure your data is never used for model training. Through our verified deletion process with complete audit trails, we guarantee your information is permanently removed from our systems.
## Quick and Secure Integration
Integrate in 5 minutes, built with enterprise security and compliance measures.
Quick integration
Pulse is deployed via our hosted-API. Complete setup takes 5 minutes, and we have detailed documentation for a streamlined process.
Industry-leading security standards
We aim to meet the highest level of security certification across every industry. Pulse is SOC 2 Type 2 and HIPAA compliant. We are happy to sign a BAA for qualifying customers.
Zero-Data Retention
We maintain strict zero data retention agreements and ensure your data is never used for model training. Through our verified deletion process with complete audit trails, we guarantee your information is permanently removed from our systems.
## Custom Processing Pipelines
Build your entire retrieval (RAG) pipeline end-to-end with Pulse.
Custom Schemas
Use plain english for precise, deterministic extraction. Define exact fields/nested data structures for accurate mapping.
Data Pipeline Configurability
Build your retrieval engine of choice with Pulse. Automate the entire flow—from document ingestion to structured extraction to database integration.
Optimized Data Processing
Process at lightning speed with flexible connectors to external tools such as Drive, Dropbox, S3, and others.
## Custom Processing Pipelines
Build your entire retrieval (RAG) pipeline end-to-end with Pulse.
Custom Schemas
Use any JSON (or natural-language) schema for precise, deterministic extraction. Define exact fields/nested data structures for accurate mapping
Data Pipeline Configurability
Build your retrieval engine of choice with Pulse. Automate the entire flow—from doc ingestion to structured JSON to vector database integration.
Optimized Data Processing
Process at lightning speed with flexible connectors to Drive, Dropbox, S3, and others.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670592d088e2d8bd68b0f6ec/670cd1647b2d0225cc758d82_Hero%20circle%20light.png)
## Packed with all the tools you need
### Keyboard shortcuts
Always be typing, even when navigating the app, with handy keyboard shortcuts.
![keyboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670592d088e2d8bd68b0f6ec/6706356a8755a96f4cf746c2_keyboard.avif)
### Fast
Built for speed, Strut streamlines your workflow into one simple app.
![bolt](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670592d088e2d8bd68b0f6ec/6706356a7cc67b505fd81ae8_bolt.avif)
### Document mentions
Mention documents in AI Chat to collaborate on multiple docs at once.
![doc](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670592d088e2d8bd68b0f6ec/6706356a51647021f7ce9c26_doc.avif)
### Dark mode
For those late night writing sessions.
![dark dashboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670592d088e2d8bd68b0f6ec/670638353743a6e49978b608_dark%20dashboard.avif)
### Fully customizable
Customize Strut to fit your workflow and projects.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pulse**

Pulse is a startup based in San Francisco that launched in 2024 and is part of Y Combinator Batch S24. With a compact team of four, Pulse is on a mission to revolutionize unstructured document extraction, making complex data accessible and usable for businesses.

**Core Offering:**
Pulse provides a powerful API that converts various document formats—like PDFs, Word files, and Excel spreadsheets—into data that large language models (LLMs) can readily process. The beauty of Pulse lies in its simplicity: it integrates seamlessly with existing systems in just five minutes, without the need for extensive training or complicated setups. This means businesses can start extracting meaningful insights from their documents almost immediately.

**Key Features:**

1. **Versatile Document Processing**: Pulse excels at accurately parsing documents, regardless of layout or format. Whether it’s charts, tables, or plain text, Pulse handles it like a pro.

2. **Industry-Agnostic Solution**: The technology is designed to be broadly applicable across a range of industries, including finance, healthcare, legal, insurance, real estate, and supply chain. Its zero-shot model means it doesn’t require custom training on proprietary data.

3. **Fast Integration and Top-notch Security**: Businesses can integrate Pulse within five minutes. It comes with enterprise-level security, being SOC 2 Type 2 and HIPAA compliant. Plus, it operates on a strict zero-data retention policy, ensuring that user data is not utilized for training their models.

4. **Custom Processing Pipelines**: Users can create tailored retrieval workflows (RAG pipelines) to automate document ingestion, structured extraction, and database integration effortlessly.

**Current Status and Future**:
Recently, Pulse announced a seed funding round of $3.9 million, which is likely to fuel its growth and bolster its development efforts. The company positions itself as a leading player in the generative AI space focused on B2B solutions.

**Further Information**:
For a deeper dive into Pulse’s offerings, pricing, or to book a demo, visit their website at [runpulse.com](https://www.runpulse.com/).

In summary, Pulse is an ambitious venture that is transforming the way businesses handle and extract insights from their unstructured data, making it not just faster and easier but also more secure and compliant. As they grow, expect Pulse to continue innovating in the generative AI and enterprise software arenas.
